commands.name: az arcdata dc config add
commands.summary: Add a value for a json path in a config file.
examples: az arcdata dc config add --path custom/control.json --json-values 'spec.storage={"accessMode":"ReadWriteOnce","className":"managed-premium","size":"10Gi"}'

commands.name: az arcdata dc config init
commands.summary: Initialize a data controller configuration profile that can be used with `az arcdata dc create`.
examples: az arcdata dc config init --source azure-arc-kubeadm --path custom

commands.name: az arcdata dc config list
examples: az arcdata dc config list --config-profile aks-dev-test

commands.name: az arcdata dc config patch
commands.summary: Patch a config file based on a json patch file.

commands.name: az arcdata dc config remove
commands.summary: Remove a value for a json path in a config file.
examples: az arcdata dc config remove --path custom/control.json --json-path '.spec.storage'

commands.name: az arcdata dc config replace
commands.summary: Replace a value for a json path in a config file.
examples: az arcdata dc config replace --path custom/control.json --json-values '$.spec.endpoints[?(@.name=="Controller")].port=30080'
az arcdata dc config replace --path custom/control.json --json-values 'spec.storage={"accessMode":"ReadWriteOnce","className":"managed-premium","size":"10Gi"}'

commands.name: az arcdata dc config show
commands.summary: Return the config of the data controller custom resource.
